description: ThePolaroid PLMRFC Macro LED Ring Flashis the ideal choice for photographers who require shadow-free illumination. This flash features 32 LED bulbs that can be fired all at once for even illumination, or 16 at a time on either side for creating purposeful shadows. The PLMRFC can also be used as a steady light source or video light with "constant on" mode. It uses AA batteries for convenient power, and attaches to your camera's hot shoe for synchronization. Includes 7 adapter rings for use with lenses with filter diameters of 52mm, 55mm, 58mm, 62mm, 67mm, 72mm and 77mm.
title: Polaroid Macro LED Ring Flash & Light For The Canon Digital EOS Rebel SL1 (100D), T5i (700D), T4i (650D), T3 (1100D), T3i (600D), T1i (500D), T2i (550D), XSI (450D), XS (1000D), XTI (400D), XT (350D), 1D C, 70D, 60D, 60Da, 50D, 40D, 30D, 20D, 10D, 5D, 1D X, 1D, 5D Mark 2, 5D Mark 3, 7D, 6D Digital SLR Cameras (Will Fit 52,55,58,62,67,72,77mm Lenses)
